languages.text: "Ты не обязан{mf||а} оправдываться перед ним, элантах. Тем более после того, как избавил{mf||а} от страданий в этой ужасной конструкции мастера плоти".
"There is no need for you to explain yourself to him, elantach. Especially not after you have released him from the torment of the fleshmaster's terrible construct."
languages.original_text: "Ты не обязан{mf||а} оправдываться перед ним, элантах. Тем более после того, как избавил{mf||а} от страданий в этой ужасной конструкции мастера плоти".

traits.locale_text: "There is no need for you to explain yourself to him, elantach. Especially not after you have released him from the torment of the fleshmaster's terrible construct."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There is no need for you to explain yourself to him, elantach. Especially not after you have released him from the torment of the fleshmaster's terrible construct."

traits.locale_text: "There is no need for you to explain yourself to him, elantach. Especially not after you have released him from the torment of the fleshmaster's terrible construct."

traits.locale_text: "There is no need for you to explain yourself to him, elantach. Especially not after you have released him from the torment of the fleshmaster's terrible construct."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «No tienes ninguna necesidad de justificar tus actos ante él, elantach. Y menos después de haberle liberado del tormento del terrible constructo del maestro de la carne».
languages.original_text: "There is no need for you to explain yourself to him, elantach. Especially not after you have released him from the torment of the fleshmaster's terrible construct."

traits.locale_text: «No tienes ninguna necesidad de justificar tus actos ante él, elantach. Y menos después de haberle liberado del tormento del terrible constructo del maestro de la carne».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「エランタ、あなたが彼に弁明する必要はない。特に、肉体支配者の恐ろしい建造物のトーメントから彼を解放してあげたあとではな」
languages.original_text: "There is no need for you to explain yourself to him, elantach. Especially not after you have released him from the torment of the fleshmaster's terrible construct."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、あなたが彼に弁明する必要はない。特に、肉体支配者の恐ろしい建造物のトーメントから彼を解放してあげたあとではな」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “你没必要向他解释，外界人。更何况，是你把他从血伶人的可怕装置中解救了出来。”
languages.original_text: "There is no need for you to explain yourself to him, elantach. Especially not after you have released him from the torment of the fleshmaster's terrible construct."

traits.locale_text: “你没必要向他解释，外界人。更何况，是你把他从血伶人的可怕装置中解救了出来。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Vous n'avez pas à vous justifier, elantach. Surtout pas après que vous l'avez libéré du tourment de la terrible structure du ciseleur de chair. »
languages.original_text: "There is no need for you to explain yourself to him, elantach. Especially not after you have released him from the torment of the fleshmaster's terrible construct."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez pas à vous justifier, elantach. Surtout pas après que vous l'avez libéré du tourment de la terrible structure du maître de la chair. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr müsst Euch nicht rechtfertigen vor ihm, Elantach. Insbesondere nachdem Ihr ihn von den Qualen des grausamen Konstrukts des Fleischmeisters befreit habt."
languages.original_text: "There is no need for you to explain yourself to him, elantach. Especially not after you have released him from the torment of the fleshmaster's terrible construct."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst Euch nicht rechtfertigen vor ihm, Elantach. Insbesondere nachdem Ihr ihn von den Qualen des grausamen Konstrukts des Fleischmeisters befreit habt."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ona meramını anlatmak zorunda değilsin elantach. Hele ki etseçerin korkunç düzeneğinde çektiği eziyetten kurtardıktan sonra..."
languages.original_text: "There is no need for you to explain yourself to him, elantach. Especially not after you have released him from the torment of the fleshmaster's terrible construct."

traits.locale_text: "Ona meramını anlatmak zorunda değilsin elantach. Hele ki etseçerin korkunç düzeneğinde çektiği eziyetten kurtardıktan sonra..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
